amendment.description: An amendment numbered 27 printed in House Report 116-61 to ensure that state healthcare Exchanges outreach activities are also targeted towards veteran populations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cunningham amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cunningham amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A026) offered by Mr. Cunningham.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
